trial_identification.studytitle: The effect of AOD9604 on weight loss in obese adults.
trial_identification.scientifictitle: A Phase IIb, Randomised, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study To Assess The Efficacy, Safety And Tolerability Of 24 Weeks Treatment With Different Doses Of AOD9604 Tablets On Weight Loss In Obese Adults.

interventions.interventions: The treatment regimen consists of 6 months (24 weeks) of orally administered AOD9604 tablets (0.25 mg, 0.5 mg or 1 mg) once per day.

primaryOutcome.outcome: To determine if orally administered AOD9604 causes a reduction in body weight following daily dosing for 12 weeks.
primaryOutcome.timepoint: At screening, baseline and 2, 4, 6, 8 and 12 weeks following treatment. commencement.

primaryOutcome.outcome: To investigate the safety and tolerability profile of AOD9604 following daily dosing for 24 weeks.
primaryOutcome.timepoint: At screening, baseline, and 2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16, 20, and 24 weeks following treatment commencement, and 4 weeks following treatment cessation.

secondaryOutcome.outcome: To determine if orally administered AOD9604 causes a reduction in body weight following daily dosing for 24 weeks.
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: At screening, baseline and 2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16, 20 and 24 weeks following treatment. commencement.

secondaryOutcome.outcome: To determine if orally administered AOD9604 causes a reduction in waist circumference following daily dosing for 24 weeks.
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: At screening, baseline, and 2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16, 20, and 24 weeks following treatment commencement.

secondaryOutcome.outcome: To determine the effect of AOD9604 on body composition as assessed by Dual Energy X-ray Absorptiometry (DEXA) following daily dosing for 24 weeks.
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: At baseline and 12 and 24 weeks following treatment commencement.

secondaryOutcome.outcome: To determine if orally administered AOD9604 causes an improvement in glucose tolerance following daily dosing for 24 weeks.
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: At baseline and 12 and 24 weeks following treatment commencement.

secondaryOutcome.outcome: To determine if orally administered AOD9604 causes an improvement in lipid profiles following once daily dosing for 24 weeks.
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: At screening, baseline and 12 and 24 weeks following treatment commencement.

eligibility.inclusivecriteria: BMI of >= 30 kg/m2 and = < 45 kg/m2 with a waist circumference of > = 102 cm (males) or >= 95 cm (females) who are otherwise healthy.
eligibility.exclusivecriteria: Subjects taking regular medication, diabetes, hypertension, hypersensitivity to hGH-related products, severe or multiple allergies, dieting or participation in any weight reduction programme in the 3 months prior to screening.

trial_design.concealment: Allocation concealment will involve an interactive voice response system (IVRS).
trial_design.sequence: A central randomisation sytem will be used. At the baseline and randomisation visit (Visit 3) participants will be stratified by the IVRS according to a number of initial variables.

ethicsAndSummary.summary: The primary purpose of this study is to determine if daily doses of AOD9604 cause weight loss in obese adults.
